paper_abstract: In this paper, we construct some new triangular preconditioners for saddle point problems based on the symmetric and triangular (ST) decomposition. Furthermore, we obtain some estimations on the condition number for the preconditioned systems and give the quasi-optimal parameters. Numerical experiments on the Stokes problems are given to illustrate fast convergence of the associated conjugate gradient method.
paper_title: New preconditioners based on symmetric-triangular decomposition for saddle point problems
